channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Copper Fever Is Breaking
item.description: The energy-transition metal is still popular among investors, but bets on a looming supply crunch look less sure than they did a month ago.

item.title: Germany’s Merck Group shares drop 10% after scrapping trial of promising cancer drug
item.description: Merck Group called off a Phase III trial of its promising cancer drug Xevinapant after an independent panel concluded it is unlikely to meet its goals

item.title: Americans Chasing High Interest Rates Risk Falling Into a 'Cash Trap'
item.description: Investors must decide whether to sit on their cash or redistribute it ahead of expected rate cuts.

item.title: ‘She told my grandchildren lies about me so they would despise me’: I’m disinheriting my ungrateful and selfish daughter. Could she contest my will?
item.description: “I once complimented my daughter and her partner on a nice plant in their garage and they started laughing, and told me it was marijuana.”

item.title: The Clock Is Ticking on Jane Fraser's Citigroup Turnaround
item.description: The CEO has called this a critical year for the troubled banking giant, after two decades of half-measures and strategic missteps.

item.title: Something unusual is happening on Wall Street — and it likely bodes well for stocks
item.description: Something unusual is happening on Wall Street that is helping to boost the confidence of stock-market bulls as the first half of 2024 comes to a close...

item.title: Nvidia Pulls S&P 500, Nasdaq Lower
item.description: The broad stock market index fell 0.3% and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 1.1%, as Nvidia shares extended their recent pullback.

item.title: Trump beats Biden for ‘king of debt’ title as market braces for crush of federal bonds
item.description: Excluding COVID stimulus money, President Trump approved $4.8 trillion in new debt to President Biden’s $2.2 trillion.

item.title: Fashion Empire Shein Has Filed for London IPO
item.description: The confidential filing earlier in June came after U.S.-China tensions hit New York plans.

item.title: ‘His wife is manipulative’: My father married a woman, 60, with no money, then changed his will. How can I preserve my inheritance?
item.description: “He changed his will, leaving his new wife his share of the estate, plus all of the contents of the house, including family heirlooms.”
